txt.en: Nefi Gemcutter has broken the setting of a necklace he once fashioned and desires a replacement.

'I was a jeweller of no small skill some time ago, and though I have now put down my tools, the pieces I fashioned during my youth are still precious to me.

'It is thus with sadness that I report to you that one of the necklaces I crafted but a few years ago has lost its setting! It has been too long for me to fashion a replacement, but if you know a jeweller who could do so, I would appreciate it.

'Bring me a glittering copper necklace, and I will pay you a fair sum. I have a few small items as well, including some leftover gemstones, with which I would be willing to part.'
Nefi Gemcutter is along the road that approaches Thorin's Hall.\n\nNefi Gemcutter has asked you to bring him a glittering copper necklace to replace one he made during his own time as a jeweller.

'You have done as I asked and brought to me a glittering copper necklace. I thank you for it and give to you these coins and materials!

'I must admit, however, that this necklace does not seem as special to me as the one that I crafted with my own hands. Perhaps I will come to appreciate this one, but I had not expected to feel this way. That's a little strange, isn't it?

'Thank you for it, friend. I am sure I will feel differently in the morning.'
Nefi Gemcutter is along the road that approaches Thorin's Hall.\n\nNefi Gemcutter has asked you to bring him an agate necklace to replace one he made during his own time as a jeweller.
'I did not think that necklace meant so much to me. How strange.'
'Were you planning on bringing me a glittering copper necklace or not?'
'I did not mean to offend. The necklace you brought me in replacement is appreciated.'
'I did not mean to offend. The necklace you brought me in replacement is appreciated.'
Bring glittering copper necklace to Nefi Gemcutter
